name: Spirulina + Turmeric Soap
short_description: Cyano Spirulina-Turmeric Soap is a unique, all-natural soap designed to rejuvenate and nourish the skin with the combined benefits of spirulina and turmeric.
full_description: Spirulina, rich in antioxidants, vitamins, and minerals, helps to detoxify and revitalize the skin, promoting a healthy, glowing complexion.

name: Spirulina + Beetroot Soap
short_description: Cyano Pure Spirulina-Beetroot Soap is a handcrafted, natural skincare product designed for deep nourishment and gentle cleansing.
full_description: Infused with organic spirulina and beetroot extract, this soap is rich in antioxidants, vitamins, and essential minerals that promote radiant and healthy skin.

name: Spirulina + Coffee Soap
short_description: Cyano Pure Spirulina-Coffee Soap is a handcrafted, all-natural soap that blends the powerful benefits of spirulina and coffee to deeply cleanse, nourish, and revitalize the skin.
full_description: Coffee, known for its exfoliating and anti-inflammatory properties, gently removes dead skin cells, reduces cellulite appearance, and enhances circulation for a radiant glow.

name: Pure Spirulina Soap
short_description: Cyano Pure Spirulina Soap is a handcrafted, all-natural soap infused with the powerful benefits of organic spirulina.
full_description: It deeply cleanses, nourishes, and revitalizes the skin with essential vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants.

name: Phycocyanin Soap
short_description: Cyano Phycocyanin Soap is a premium handmade soap infused with phycocyanin, the powerful blue pigment from spirulina, known for its antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties.
full_description: This soap deeply nourishes the skin, promotes cell regeneration, and helps combat dryness, acne, and premature aging. Enriched with natural oils and glycerin, it hydrates, soothes irritation, and enhances skin elasticity, leaving a radiant glow.

name: Spirulina + Rice Flour Soap
short_description: Cyano Rice Flour Soap is a natural, handcrafted soap enriched with the goodness of rice flour, known for its skin-brightening and exfoliating properties.
full_description: The soap helps reduce dark spots, pigmentation, and tan while promoting an even skin tone.

name: Cyano Shampoo
short_description: Cyano Shampoo with a blend of 30 herbs and Spirulina to strengthen roots and promote healthy hair.
full_description: Sourced from the lush forests of Dang, Gujarat, this nutrient-rich shampoo deeply nourishes the scalp, strengthens hair roots, and promotes healthy, fast hair growth.
usage_instructions: Apply on wet scalp and rinse thoroughly.

name: Cyano Hair Oil
short_description: Cyano Hair Oil, a nourishing oil with 30 herbs and Spirulina to reduce hair fall and boost shine.
full_description: Sourced from the pristine forests of Dang, Gujarat, this chemical-free formula deeply hydrates, reduces hair fall, and enhances hair texture, leaving it silky, smooth, and naturally shiny.
usage_instructions: Massage into scalp and leave overnight.

name: Organic Spirulina Powder
short_description: A nutrient powerhouse with 60-70% protein, rich in vitamins and minerals.
full_description: Our Spirulina is dried at low temperatures to retain maximum nutrients, ensuring a potent, high-quality supplement for your daily health.
usage_instructions: Mix with smoothies, juice, or water daily.

name: Spirulina Jelly Candies
short_description: A fun and ideal way for kids and adults to enjoy the benefits of Spirulina.
full_description: These candies are crafted by blending organic spirulina into a chewy, flavorful jelly format.
